products.description: The rosso softshade clay rock grey is presented in a stone grey hue that will coordinate well with a natural inspired colour palette. This blind with its horizontal striped design and voile panels is an elegant way to control the incoming light within your space and achieve level of privacy you desire. products.description: The rosso softshade clay grey features a delicately textured soft grey fabric that will team beautifully with a number of home styles. This blind will have a serene effect on your living space thanks to its classic style and inspired striped design allowing you to alter the amount of light you let in. products.title: Guarda Stripe, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: The subtle latte brown and dove grey colour palette of the guarda stripe in grey is versatile enough to work in most dcor schemes, whilst the off-white background and occasional jet black stripe offset the colours perfectly. Use the grey to create a strong, moody style in a den or study. Embrace the colour scheme and opt for grey walls and black and white accessories, using the odd light wood to bring out the unusual tan tone in the blind.

products.title: Narvik, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring sweet bird images, alongside cutely styled flowers and leaves, the narvik in grey makes for a pretty and welcoming roman blind. The grey background makes this a versatile piece that will work as part of a number of dcor and colour schemes. Hang the grey in your home study, going for a bold feature wall in sunny yellow, with white paint on the remaining walls. Opt for lightly coloured furniture with clean, sharp lines, and accent throughout the room with matching yellows, greys, and whites.

products.title: Amelie, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: Fusing rustic style with monochrome chic, the amelie in pebble is a wild and wistful piece, consisting of lightly sketched florals in jet blacks and barely-there greys bedded on a grainy, oatmeal linen. Adopt a modern take on country flair in your master or guest bedroom by hanging the pebble amidst finished woods and painted wickers. Accompany the scheme with brushed silver finishings, adding a deep red, sage green, or rustic heather if you can't resist a splurge of colour.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Steel - Roman Blind
products.description: Generate an indulgent and contemporary space by adding the lustre in steel, a roman blind made from a lavish, velvety thread to form a dramatic look with sumptuous fabrics in smoky silver with blue hues and a modern metallic sheen. Include the regal steel in a subtle white and grey bedroom for a cultured and classy theme, adding blends of plush, textured fabrics and cotton-fresh linens for an inviting finish.

products.title: Maurice, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: Combining modern, textured cloth with stark colour, it doesn't get much more contemporary than the maurice in charcoal. The moody slate grey makes a striking statement against the soft and silky feel of this blind, forming a cosy look with daring shade. Add luxury and elegance to either a contemporary bedroom or traditional living room by hanging the fearless black amongst soothing walls in either dove grey or white, and incorporating alike textured fabrics for a cosy feel with a sophisticated finish.

products.title: Shine, Grey - Day Night Blind
products.description: For a silver that isn't a bold, modern metallic, go for the shine in grey, which displays a pale, shimmering tone that reflects the light and offers a subtle hint of glamour. The look is made streamlined by the hidden controls, which sit in the overhead rail cassette for usable functionality. Complement a bold navy colour scheme in the dining room by including the grey, which will look striking and impactful against a dark blue wall.

products.title: Aarlborg Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: The fancy pattern which comes with the aarlborg range is a reason to buy it, at an affordable price the aarlborg range would fit perfectly in any room. Beautiful variations of grey will add more style to your room. products.title: Lovebirds, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The tropical tones of the lovebirds pebble are tempered by beautiful pebble greys and soft whites, allowing the greens, yellows, and pinky reds to really pop from the fabric. The foliage and bird pattern is ornate and eye-catching, and sure to get conversation started. Give the pebble a home in your study, where the bold and vivacious colours can inspire creativity and hard work. Keep the room feeling light and airy with white or palest grey walls, contemporary furniture, and light wooden floors.

products.title: Grove, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: Understated and subtle, the pretty pinks of the grove in rosemist are a treat to the eye. On a creamy background, watercolour-style florals and foliage give this blind a summery, yet somewhat ethereal, look that you'll just love. If you love an unusual look in the kitchen, colour it pink and cream, and give the rosemist centre stage. Surround with cream units and pale pink walls, accenting with carefully picked utensils in matching pink tones.

products.title: Aquataine, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The aquataine charcoal is a sophisticated affair, mingling classic florals with slate and dove greys on a soft white canvas. This blind is a classy and stylish one, and you'll find that it adds a modish edge to any room it's placed in. Place a romantic take on monochrome, using the charcoal in a contemporary living room amongst a range of linens, wools, and voiles in greys, blacks, and whites. Choose ornaments and accessories in brushed silver or modern pewter to complement the scheme.

products.title: Fandango, Zinc - Roman Blind
products.description: The unusual look of the fandango zinc is a real eye-catcher. A jet black background is home to tropical foliage in zesty shades of grass green, candy pink, and turquoise blue and the effect is simply stunning. The zinc should be the star of the show so place it against a turquoise feature wall in your dining room, where it can take centre stage as the focal point of the room. Keep furniture up-to-date and contemporary, accessorising throughout the room with pink and green ornaments and wall art.

products.title: Lottie Silver Grey Curtain
products.description: The lottie silver curtain uses a cool and sparkling silver shade that is ideal for a clean and sharp contemporary scheme. The woven jacquard style gives depth and texture to the intricate fern leaf design and teamed with a full lining, this curtain is sure to look luxurious at any window. Its contemporary bird and tree patterning plays host to a muted charcoal grey, as well as understated tones of sage green, ice blue, indigo purple, mustard yellow, and creamy biscuit. What more could you want?Hang the charcoal in the living room or kitchen, where the sweet birds will sit pretty and add character to the space. Choose an accent colour from the blind and use it throughout the room to bring the tone to life.

products.description: In soft, subtle mocha brown, the windsor taupe is an elegant and sophisticated blind, combining a silky and satiny sheen to complement its pretty colour. Gently raised ribbing provides this otherwise sleek fabric with depth and texture, adding a characterful feel to the blind. The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

products.title: Kensington, Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with colourful fruits, the kensington in stone is sure to whet the appetite. The grey-toned white of the background provides a serene base that allows the deep blue, red, and coral hues to truly pop, offering a gorgeously understated sensation of colour. This array of fruit surely belongs in the kitchen or dining room. Place against a feature wall in deep blue or burnt orange and use the same colours to accent with accessories throughout the rest of the room.

products.title: Nightshade, Mist - Day Night Blind
products.description: In pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are neatly hidden from view in the blind's rail cassette, from which the blind hangs neatly and easily. Use the mist to complement a petrol blue and soft grey colour scheme in a contemporary living room, where it will look striking against a blue feature wall.

products.title: Jungle, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The jungle pebble blends fun and exciting illustration with similarly eye-catching colouring. A softly toned grey forms the canvas of the piece, with teal blue, apple green, mustard oranges, and candy pinks shading the pretty jungle imagery. The result? An unusual yet irresistible window covering. A child's bedroom or playroom would be an obvious choice for the pebble, where surrounding it with similarly fun shades will surely stir your child's imagination.

products.title: Carlotta, Pebble - Roman Blind
products.description: The stylish light grey acts as the perfect canvas for the flourish of natural colours that make up carlotta pebble. The vibrancy of the pinks and reds is matched by the vitality of the greens and yellows to create a stunning visual that is a treat for your eyes. Dress the living room to impress with the inspired choice of carlotta pebble. Add in a matching lampshade and a set of scatter cushions to create a theme that welcomes you in without overpowering your senses.

The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. products.title: Oasis, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: The oasis charcoal is a beautiful hybrid of abstract patterning and colourful foliage. Mauves and blues meet alongside rich charcoal, surrounded by a cool off-white tone. The blind has an ethereal quality that would look stunning in both contemporary or period homes. Make a feature of the charcoal by placing it against a wall in the palest of greys. Furnish the room in medium woods, dusky blues, and muted mauves, being sure to add in plenty of plush fabrics for extra comfort and style.

products.title: Origin, Grey - Vista Blind
products.description: Origin grey brings a modern light stone grey into your home and combines it with the clean and clear lines that only a contemporary vista blind can provide. Finely woven and expertly crafted, no matter how discerning your eye is you are guaranteed to appreciate the workmanship that goes into every square inch. The ability to give your room the perfect light levels all day long makes your kitchen a fantastic choice for origin grey.

products.title: Origin, Taupe - Vista Blind
products.description: A light beige fabric sits harmoniously below a matching voile to create the latest addition to their range of vista blinds. Lightweight and elegantly poised, every square inch is crafted with care to ensure that you add nothing but understated luxury to your home. If you want to give your home a touch of rustic country with a modern twist there is no better addition to make to your home than origin taupe.

products.title: Pavillion, Grey - Roman Blind
products.description: Keep up with the latest home dcor trends by including the pavillion in grey in your home. The fashionable grey and yellow colour pairing is both stylish and fun, and offers a serene look without compromising on colour. Hang the grey in your home study for a serious yet interesting look and feel. Opt for pale grey walls and accent throughout with charcoal greys and mustard yellows. Frame yellow and grey wall art in black, and go for modern, sleek furniture.

products.title: Africa (Blackout), Shadow - Roller Blind
products.description: There's nothing more awe-inspiring than standing back and immersing yourself in the intricacy of the tribal stylings of their new africa blackout shadow fabric. It gives any space your heart desires an added layer of depth and clarity, and it even has the splash of colour that can be so hard to integrate. Match shadow to some tribal themed wall art and you'll be able to turn the master bedroom into the homely and inspiring space that you love to relax in at the end of a long day.
